ygData.subject: Re: Research Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: what i have learnt from some experienced folks... just dump everything i u have into research... since theres a limit ... dont think will take up all ya points
ygData.messageBody:
what i have learnt from some experienced folks... just dump everything i u
have into research... since theres a limit ... dont think will take up all
ya points also... unless u have tons of runes to use... when im level 20...
i almost suceed in making level 16 words all the time... like u said 80%
lor... but if i try level 20 spells... then theres high chance i will
fail... although its possible that a level 16 suceed in getting level 20
spells... so... conclusion DUMP EVERYTHING IN

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 10:19 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Research Tips


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Anyone got any reseach tips to share? How to train it and how much skill
u
> need b4 u got a high chance (say 80%) to research a particular lvl spell?
>
> Believe it or not, at lvl 29 I never do a single research so far and I got
> all the necessary spells (as a nuker and traveller) I need, either buying
> from wiz guild or getting from 'some' other sources ;)
>
> Say now I never train or use research skill b4, shld I dump in max skill
> points (and pay pp also) to max out the skill 1st, or ???
>
> TIA!
>
> Ziltus
>
> p/s: VS guild is formed last night, with 10 kakis, with GM Sereph the flat
